note.p: Education: Edinburgh; MA (1684); Leyden (admitted 1687); Rheims; MD (1691)
Career: Practised in Edinburgh; MP for Ayr Burghs (1710-death); Physician to the King; after his death his library was sold under the title 'Bibliotheca Oliphantana'
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Innes Smith; Sedgwick
References: Historical Register Chronological Diary 1719, p42 (obituary)
Notes: Musgrave gives date of death as 9 Dec 1719. Index to BR gives year only, 1720.
